name: Starship Asteroid
description:
Features
  • Space-like physics
  • Tally score for each destroyed asteroid
  • Fly around and shoot lasers at asteroids
Story

In the deep space faraway, you, a pilot of asteroid buster spaceship, must face the threat of incoming asteroids which continue target you. Dodge and destroy the asteroids before they destroy your spaceship.

Gameplay

The game does not have win condition as you endlessly destroy asteroids and rack up points for every destruction. However, the game ends when your spaceship has been hitted by asteroid five times.
